channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Priors Road heavily rutted and desperately needs resurfacing, 12th April
item.description:
Could someone explain to me why Glos Highways are seemingly doing NOTHING to remedy the atrocious state of the road? What do your Highways inspectors actually do? Appalling - Glos Highways should be ashamed of what they are ignoring and in turn placing road users lives at risk
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chiltern Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights from A417, 12th April
item.description:
Traffic lights from A417 aren’t timed properly and only allowing 3 cars per lane through. Causing major delays - this has been for several days now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Graffiti in children’s play park, 12th April
item.description:

item.title: Traffic lights changing too quickly, only allowing 2-3 cars through which is causing a back up of traffic, 12th April
item.description:
Traffic lights on zoons court roundabout, near Gloucester, approaching the roundabout from the brockworth area, exits on roundabout are, in order, longlevens, Gloucester, church down, golden valley

item.title: Edge of carriageway broken away - this has been reported once already., 12th April
item.description:
This area has already been reported and Glos Highways came and painted white lines around just 3 areas (the worst parts) These white lines washed off within a few days! You have recently emailed to say the problem has been resolved, it has not! No work has been done and the broken away side of the carriageway remains very bad. see below for the original report details. .Web Reference: 5753071 Enquiry Number: 22044785 Issue: Pothole on the Carriageway It is directly opposite The Timberyard, High Cross Elkstone gate entrance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light sequence not working, 12th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester

item.title: Flooding in Farm Lane and potholes, 12th April
item.description:
Ref 5594205. - Despite on 3rd April you claiming this issue is resolved all that has been done is 2 flood signs erected. The water is still pouring out of the drain and now considerable road damaged incl 2 sizeable potholes exist on Farm Lane (GL51 4XN) This issue was first reported in Feb.. please can somebody do more than just close down the ticket and say it is fixed otherwise I will have no alternative but to escalate to senior management / local MP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
